title: [MINDSET] Ep. 161 How To Build Self-Confidence w/ Elle Russ
description:
How often do you stand in your worth with confidence?

Â 

This week Ash talks with Elle Russ an author, TV and film writer, and Podcast host to discuss how to build your self-confidence and build your mindset health.Â 

Â 

It is so easy to share the struggles of those who arenâ€™t confident, and yet, when you are confident, alpha, and powerful, there are a surprising handful of pitfalls to overcome. Listen in to learn how to navigate both ends of the spectrum and be truly confident. Elle shares the value of vulnerability, tools to be confident, and accessible.Â Â 

Â 

Being shy doesnâ€™t mean you canâ€™t be confident. Elle walks through what confidence actually is and how you can become more confident in your own way. Ash and Elle walk through navigating social media, narcissism, overgiving, and no longer letting yourself be a victim.Â 

Â 

Resources:

Confident As Fu*k by Elle Russ

Paleo Thyroid Solution by Elle Russ

Â 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. The pitfalls of confident people and alpha females.
  2. True confidence versus performance confidence.
  3. What is personal and what is private.
  4. An alternative perspective on being humble and how to speak well about yourself with grace.

Â 

Where You Can Find Elle Russ:

https://www.elleruss.com/
